sources.comment: Public key source from the NodeSource repository.

refs.comment: SANS SEC540 (first acknowledgment of this key)

Maintainer @riosje cites official installation procedures exhibiting use of script (https://deb.nodesource.com/setup_20.x) which itself imports GPG key from https://deb.nodesource.com/gpgkey/nodesource-repo.gpg.key which resolves to 6F71F525282841EEDAF851B42F59B5F99B1BE0B4 when inspected with `gpg --list-packets`.
GitHub user @riosje (Jefferson) is affiliated with NodeSource, as indicated on their GitHub profile.
